languages.text: {n}Что-то изменилось в Ульфаре — внешне он кажется здоровым, но свет в его глазах потух и сменился кровавой дымкой {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}подступающего безумия{/d}. Губы усохли и плотно сжались — нелегко таким устам будет петь славные саги. В голосе клокочет зловещий рык:{/n} "Эттфатер. Хорошо, что ты жив{mf||а}".

{n}Something has changed in Ulfar — on the surface, he appears healthy, but the light in his eyes has gone out, replaced by the blood haze of {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}creeping madness{/d}. His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то изменилось в Ульфаре — внешне он кажется здоровым, но свет в его глазах потух и сменился кровавой дымкой {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}подступающего безумия{/d}. Губы усохли и плотно сжались — нелегко таким устам будет петь славные саги. В голосе клокочет зловещий рык:{/n} "Эттфатер. Хорошо, что ты жив{mf||а}".

His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."

languages.text: {n}Algo ha cambiado en Ulfar. A primera vista parece estar sano, pero la luz de sus ojos se ha extinguido, dando paso a la sangrienta neblina de una {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}locura creciente{/d}. Sus labios resecos están prietos y marchitos, lo que dificulta que entonen gloriosas sagas. Su voz es un gruñido malévolo:{/n} «Aett-Vater. Me alegro de que aún viva».
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar — on the surface, he appears healthy, but the light in his eyes has gone out, replaced by the blood haze of {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}creeping madness{/d}. His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo ha cambiado en Ulfar. A primera vista parece estar sano, pero la luz de sus ojos se ha extinguido, dando paso a la sangrienta neblina de una locura creciente. Sus labios resecos están prietos y marchitos, lo que dificulta que entonen gloriosas sagas. Su voz es un gruñido malévolo:{/n} «Aett-Vater. Me alegro de que aún viva».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法身上发生了变化。从表面上看，他似乎很健康，但他眼中的光芒已然熄灭，取而代之的是{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}不断蔓延的疯狂{/d}与血色的阴霾。他干枯的嘴唇紧绷着，看起来十分干瘪，这样的嘴里恐怕不会再颂唱出辉煌的史诗了。他的声音夹带着恶毒的低吼。{/n}“狼领，你还活着，这很好。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar — on the surface, he appears healthy, but the light in his eyes has gone out, replaced by the blood haze of {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}creeping madness{/d}. His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法身上发生了变化。从表面上看，他似乎很健康，但他眼中的光芒已然熄灭，取而代之的是不断蔓延的疯狂与血色的阴霾。他干枯的嘴唇紧绷着，看起来十分干瘪，这样的嘴里恐怕不会再颂唱出辉煌的史诗了。他的声音夹带着恶毒的低吼。{/n}“狼领，你还活着，这很好。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの中の何かが変わった。外観は健全そうに見えるが、目の中の光が消え、代わりに{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}忍び寄る狂気{/d}の血のモヤがかかっている。乾いた唇は固く結ばれている。あのような口から輝かしいサーガを語るのは難しいだろう。彼の声は悪意に満ちたうなり声で震えている。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル、あんたが生きてて良かった」
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar — on the surface, he appears healthy, but the light in his eyes has gone out, replaced by the blood haze of {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}creeping madness{/d}. His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの中の何かが変わった。外観は健全そうに見えるが、目の中の光が消え、代わりに忍び寄る狂気の血のモヤがかかっている。乾いた唇は固く結ばれている。あのような口から輝かしいサーガを語るのは難しいだろう。彼の声は悪意に満ちたうなり声で震えている。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル、あんたが生きてて良かった」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar vous apparaît changé. Extérieurement, il semble en bonne santé, mais l'éclat qui illuminait son regard s'est éteint, supplanté par le voile sanglant d'une {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}folie insidieuse{/d}. Serrées et racornies, ses lèvres desséchées auront désormais bien du mal à chanter de glorieuses sagas. Sa voix se fait rauque et malveillante :{/n} « Aett-vater. Content de voir que vous êtes en vie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar — on the surface, he appears healthy, but the light in his eyes has gone out, replaced by the blood haze of {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}creeping madness{/d}. His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar vous apparaît changé. Extérieurement, il semble en bonne santé, mais l'éclat qui illuminait son regard s'est éteint, supplanté par le voile sanglant d'une folie insidieuse. Serrées et racornies, ses lèvres desséchées auront désormais bien du mal à chanter de glorieuses sagas. Sa voix se fait rauque et malveillante :{/n} « Aett-vater. Content de voir que vous êtes en vie. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}In Ulfar hat sich etwas verändert – oberflächlich wirkt er gesund, doch das Licht in seinen Augen ist erloschen und dem Blutnebel {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}schleichenden Wahnsinns{/d} gewichen. Seine trockenen Lippen sind fest zusammengepresst, verkümmert – glorreiche Sagen werden es schwer haben, aus einem solchen Mund zu strömen. Seine Stimme ist ein rasselndes, böses Knurren:{/n} "Aett-Vater. Es ist gut, dass Ihr am Leben seid."
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar — on the surface, he appears healthy, but the light in his eyes has gone out, replaced by the blood haze of {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}creeping madness{/d}. His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Ulfar hat sich etwas verändert — oberflächlich wirkt er gesund, doch das Licht in seinen Augen ist erloschen und dem Blutnebel schleichenden Wahnsinns gewichen. Seine trockenen Lippen sind fest zusammengepresst, verkümmert — glorreiche Sagen werden es schwer haben, aus einem solchen Mund zu strömen. Seine Stimme ist ein rasselndes, böses Knurren:{/n} "Aett-Vater. Es ist gut, dass Ihr am Leben seid."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar — on the surface, he appears healthy, but the light in his eyes has gone out, replaced by the blood haze of creeping madness. His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'da bir değişiklik fark ediyorsun. Dışarıdan sağlıklı gözükse de gözlerindeki ışıltı, yerini {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}ürpertici bir deliliğin{/d} kanlı gölgesine bırakmış. Kurumuş dudakları, şanlı destanlar anlatamayacak kadar sıkı sıkıya kapalı ve buruşuk. Sesi kötücül bir hırıltıyla titriyor.{/n} "Aett-Vater. Sağ olmana sevindim."
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar — on the surface, he appears healthy, but the light in his eyes has gone out, replaced by the blood haze of {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Wulfen}creeping madness{/d}. His dry lips are tight and shrivelled — glorious sagas will struggle to pour forth from such a mouth. His voice rattles with a malevolent growl:{/n} "Aett-Vater. It is good that you are alive."
